title: Paulo Roberto Gonzaga
text:
Paulo Roberto Gonzaga (パウリーニョ, born January 26, 1989), most commonly known as Paulinho, is a Brazilian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> who currently plays for <a href="Fagiano%20Okayama">Fagiano Okayama</a>.
Club statistics.
"Updated to 24 February 2019".
